nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Stickerscapes
Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Stickerscapes is a sticker book tying-in with film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. It was released on September 4, 2015.

Let your creativity run wild with Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: The Force Awakens™: Stickerscapes. Containing more than 1,000 reusable stickers of new heroes, villains, and vehicles, Stickerscapes includes 14 amazing backgrounds for you to create your own Star Wars: The Force Awakens scenes!
